verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3570>Cushi,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%>
"I will <S%H5486>completely<s%> <S%H5486>remove<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [things] From the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"I will <S%H5486>remove<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> I will <S%H5486>remove<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> And the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And the <S%H4384>ruins<s%> <S%H854>along<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"So I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> And <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> [And] the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H3649>idolatrous<s%> <S%H3649>priests<s%> <S%H5973>along<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

"And those who <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetops<s%> to the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And those who <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> [and] <S%H7650>swear<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and [yet] <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H4445>Milcom,<s%>

And those who have <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H5472>back<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And those <S%H834>who<s%> have not <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> or <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of Him. "

Be <S%H2013>silent<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> He has <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> His <S%H7121>guests.<s%>

"Then it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the Lord's <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> That I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> the king's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3847>clothe<s%> themselves with <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H4403>garments.<s%>

"And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H1801>leap<s%> on the [temple] <S%H4670>threshold,<s%> Who <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H113>lord<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>

"And on that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "There will be the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H6818>cry<s%> from the <S%H1709>Fish<s%> <S%H8179>Gate,<s%> A <S%H3215>wail<s%> from the <S%H4932>Second<s%> Quarter, And a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H7667>crash<s%> from the <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

<S%H3213>"Wail,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H4389>Mortar,<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> will be <S%H1820>silenced;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H5187>weigh<s%> out <S%H3701>silver<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about at that <S%H6256>time<s%> That I will <S%H2664>search<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> Who are <S%H7087>stagnant<s%> in <S%H8105>spirit,<s%> Who <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> or <S%H7489>evil!<s%>'

"Moreover, their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4933>plunder,<s%> And their <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H8077>desolate;<s%> Yes, they will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> but not <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> [them], And <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> but not <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H3196>wine.<s%>"

<S%H7138>Near<s%> is the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7138>Near<s%> and <S%H9248>coming<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H9248>quickly;<s%> <S%H6963>Listen,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%> In it the <S%H1368>warrior<s%> <S%H6873>cries<s%> out <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath<s%> is that <S%H3117>day,<s%> A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H4691>distress,<s%> A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H9585>destruction<s%> and <S%H4875>desolation,<s%> A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H653>gloom,<s%> A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6051>clouds<s%> and <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>darkness,<s%>

A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and <S%H8643>battle<s%> <S%H8643>cry,<s%> <S%H5921>Against<s%> the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> And the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6438>corner<s%> <S%H6438>towers.<s%>

And I will <S%H9503>bring<s%> <S%H9503>distress<s%> on <S%H120>men,<s%> So that they will <S%H1980>walk<s%> like the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And their <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be <S%H8210>poured<s%> out like <S%H6083>dust,<s%> And their <S%H3894>flesh<s%> like <S%H1557>dung.<s%>

<S%H1571>Neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> their <S%H2091>gold<s%> Will be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the Lord's <S%H5678>wrath;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H398>devoured<s%> In the <S%H784>fire<s%> of His <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> For He will <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>end,<s%> <S%H389>Indeed<s%> a <S%H926>terrifying<s%> one, Of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
